verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Monday , host Sean Hannity called out the media and suggested that they are missing the “ biggest story in their lifetime ” because of their hatred of President Donald J. Trump .
